mobile.$description: Mobile viewport theme identifier. Used by components to determine mobile-specific responsive behavior and styling.

desktop.$description: Desktop viewport theme identifier. Used by components to determine desktop-specific responsive behavior and styling.

mult-static.$description: Base scaling multiplier for consistent sizing across the design system. Used as foundation for spacing, sizing, and responsive calculations.

0.$description: Base value for smallest viewports (0px and larger).

640.$description: Used for small viewports (640px and larger).

768.$description: Used for medium viewports (768px and larger).

1024.$description: Used for large viewports (1024px and larger).

1280.$description: Used for extra large viewports (1280px and larger).

1536.$description: Used for ultra-wide viewports (1536px and larger).
